articles.title: Dzulfiqar Fathur Rahman
articles.contents:
Dzulfiqar Fathur Rahman
          
          
          Blog
          Projects
          ☰
          
          
      
        
          
            Dzulfiqar Fathur Rahman
          
          
            
              I am a journalist based in Bekasi, West Java, Indonesia. I wrangle and analyze data to tell stories that affect both people and businesses. I also build tools with R to improve my work

articles.title: Projects
articles.contents:
Data journalism at The Jakarta Post

Code, data and documentation behind the analysis and graphics in my stories on The Jakarta Post.

2021–2022






jpwrapper

An R package to customize Datawrapper charts with design principles I use at The Jakarta Post.

January 2021
